title: Continuous Countercurrent Chromatography Process Design: Iterative Learning-Based Strategy

context.prior_knowledge: Foundations of separation processes, principles of chromatography, and understanding of mathematical modeling
context.additional_context: Focuses on pre-service teachers learning process design methods applicable to actual industrial settings. Self-directed learning primarily through video lectures and simulation tools on smartphone-based LMS

learning_goals: Learners can explain methods for linking physical modeling of SMB processes with experimental data
Learners can optimize chromatography process conditions using iterative learning-based strategies
Analyze online measurement data to calibrate model parameters and update operational conditions

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
